dialogues.text: Every society, dating back to the  ancients, has had theories regarding  dreams, what they mean, how to control  them.  Aristotle believed that during  sleep you soul roams free.  What it sees  are dreams.  Skilled dreamers control  what they see.  There is a theory that  there are two gates your soul can enter,  one a positive gate, the other a  negative.  The dreammaster guards the  positive gate and protects its sleeping  host.  There are fewer theories about the  negative gate...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick sits on the toilet. He looks up in surprise when the door begins to rattle.  A bunch of girls in cheerleading  costume suddenly barge in.  They look down at Rick and la as he struggles to pull up his trousers. Suddenly the room begins to shake.  Rick looks around and sees the room transform into an elevator.  Buttons push o of the walls and the doors change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the girls pushes button #13.  The elevator shoots Rick is astonished.  The doors open and the girls shove o Rick can see Alice among the girls.  She is pushing forwa trying to go help him.  She disappears in the crowd.  Ric looks around at:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rick looks ahead into the hellish bathroom.  In front of he sees the familiar back of Kristen.  She leans over the sink, looking in the mirror.  The mirror image speaks to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, Rick.  Make me laugh. Rick steps forward to go to Kristen.  She turns, revealin her face is a burned horrific mess.  Kristen laughs evill Rick reels back into the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors slam shut in Rick's face.  Suddenly the elevato rocketed downward.  Rick holds on for his life.  The butt sequence faster and faster until they are a blurry glow. Through the elevator speaker comes Freddy's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going down.  Women's wear, lingerie,  cutlery, butcher knives.  China... The elevator comes to sudden halt, Rick is thrown to the  ground by the impact.  He gets up and looks around as the door opens into:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pristine clean Chinese room (a la living quarters in  Chinese Ghost Story) - tatami mattes, white and colored  screens, open, light and airy.  Rick steps out tentativel He scans the room suspiciously, then more calmly. Suddenly, out of nowhere, Rick is hurtled backward as if  kicked by an invisible opponent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the... Freddy's voice is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A true warrior, Rick-san, needs no eyes. Rick is kicked again and floored.  He stands, now angry. flails around at the air, then is hit again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come out and fight me, you chicken shit. Freddy's laugh is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ninja warriors have calm.  Find your  balance, Rick. Rick is hit again and thrown back against a screen which  breaks.  He stands up slowly, with ultimate concentration turns quickly as if with radar. Suddenly he kicks back at air and connects.  A resounding thump is heard.  He  progresses forward in a series of karate moves all of whi connect soundly and quickly with the invisible force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too wimpy to show yourself, Krueger?   Well, how's this for balance? With extra strength, Rick kicks out in the air.  He conne hard and suddenly Freddy's glove appears out of thin air lands on the floor as if kicked off by Rick's power. Rick stops and stares at the glove on the ground.  He lau victoriously. RICK (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hahaha.  You superhero.  How you gonna  get me without your weapon?  You're dead  meat. Rick looks down as Freddy's laugh resounds through the ro Suddenly the glove jumps up in the air and goes straight Rick, reaming him in the stomach.  Rick falls over - dead

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hari-kari to you and your balance, boy.   Sayonara, Rick-san.

There are a few te classmates of Rick. Alice and Debbie stand off to the side.  Alice is clutchi Rick's oriental bandana tightly in one hand.  Debbie is  sobbing softly.  Alice is cold blue steel.  She's wearing Rick's dark sunglasses.

dialogues.text: Hey, you know I wouldn't leave you all  alone.  This was just to fool Freddy.   I'm here. Alice stares at him, longingly.  Finally she shakes her h 'no'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there something we can do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so.  I guess this is my own  war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it isn't.  We all gotta survive. She pumps up. DEBBIE (cont'd)

dialogues.text: I don't spend hours working out to let  some damn nightstalker beat me.

dialogues.text: You don't really get it.  He's not a  nightstalker.  It'll take more than bench  presses to beat him.

dialogues.text: Why can't we just talk to the  authorities?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, right.  Let's trade death by Freddy  for life in a rubber room.  Adults won't  see it. They can't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then what else can we do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try what other kids did.  Keep each other  awake.  We'll meet at Debbie's tonight.   At least if we don't sleep he can't get  us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know just the guy. Dan shrugs and leaves with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice hangs Rick's oriental bandana on the mirror, next t Sheila's gadget.  She places Debbie's studded bracelet on vanity table.  Alice looks at herself in the mirror.   Something catches her eye. She takes another picture off the mirror's surface.  It's picture of her and Rick.  She looks up, she can see more herself.  She's quite beautiful now, and there's a surety strength in her eyes.  She stares at her reflection. She's brought Rick's nun-chucks up from the garage.  She  begins to go through some moves with them.  Slowly at fir she builds to a blinding speed.  She watches herself in t mirror. Alice GASPS and drops the sticks.  She walks to the mirro and places a hand on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (scared)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening to me?

dialogues.text: Johnson is slumped in a chair watching a soundless TV.  A Alice ENTERS, dressed to leave, he rises to stop her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you're not leaving this house. He stands in front of her, slightly menacing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of my way you pathetic lush.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Honey, I may be a drunk, but I want you  here.  We're all we have... Alice softens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, please... Johnson lapses into a drunken monologue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope, gonna watch you, didn't watch him,  lost him, won't lose you...you're stayin'  in... Alice waits a moment, then reaches out and puts a hand on father's face. She holds it there a second. JOHNSON (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're becoming beautiful, I never  noticed before... Johnson clumsily backs up and pours another drink. Alice  heads back upstairs.

dialogues.text: Dan waits for Alice, he's leaning up against a street lam

dialogues.text: All the towns in America, I had to move  to the Bermuda triangle.

dialogues.text: The room has been outfitted to serve as her gym.  It is  equipped with free weights, and a weight bench. Debbie greets, dressed in sweats, yawns.  Looks at her wa She looks tired.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice is seated on her bed, she's staring at her mirror. gets up and crosses to the window.  She opens it and clim out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice climbs out of the window and maneuvers down to the  street in a duplication of the moves we saw earlier from  Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice reaches Dan's corner, he's gone.  She looks around, one in sight.  Frustrated, she walks off and turns a corn

dialogues.text: Alice turns the corner and in an abrupt, sudden change of setting she finds herself in the middle of a run down, se urban street. It's empty, just blackened store fronts.  Alice spies the glowing marquee of a movie theater at the end of the stre

dialogues.text: Alice reaches the B.O.  She takes a ticket from the atten and wanders in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice takes a seat in the fifth row.  She has a box of  popcorn and a soda.  There are other patrons scattered ab the balcony.  We can't see their faces. Alice settles in.  She starts to watch the movie.  She sc a mouthful of popcorn.

dialogues.speaker: MADNESS
dialogues.text: Stoned patrons campily cavort and dance to the diner's  jukebox in a scene from REEFER MADNESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice sips her drink, adjusts herself.  Something about t film is making her uncomfortable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's not as we know it from earlier scenes.  It's the CRAVE-INN of the future.  A beaten-down forgotten mutt of place.  All peeling paint and flapping canvas awning. We watch as the lights in the diner SWITCH ON and a wind  kicks up, blowing tumbleweeds and newspapers across the f of the diner. Suddenly, the front doors are blown off their hinges and picks up.  It whistles as the air becomes thick with dust debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the wind whips over Alice, her popcorn scatters like a white rain.  Her drink is pulled out of her hand by the  wind's force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now hurricanes speeds are pounding the diner, the wind  getting stronger and stronger as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice is standing, fighting the wind that's pulling her t the edge of the balcony.  She tries to grab her seat, cla fingers ripping into seatbacks, only to slip away. Alice is lifted off her feet and sucked right over the  balcony by the wind. She just manages to grab the balcony's edge and hold on, swinging free, trying to crawl back up... The wind beating her back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooooo! suddenly, one of Alice's shoes is pulled right off her fo and FLIES ACROSS THE AUDITORIUM into

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Alice's shoe hits the movie screen and PASSES THROUGH. see it roll across the floor of the diner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wind is stronger still and Alice is struggling to  maintain her grip on the balcony. The other patrons just sit in their seats, watching. Alice manages to hoist herself up just a bit in order to the faces of the others in the theater. They're all blank looking pasty-faced people with death-l visages. Alice SCREAMS as a gust of wind rips her from the balcony sends her FLYING ACROSS THE AUDITORIUM, passing through t movie screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice tumbles into the shot, landing in front of the dine exterior.  Wind and debris blow, boards fly off the struc as she struggles to her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice makes her way into the diner.  She looks back.  The movie screen is behind her and beyond it is the auditoriu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice turns and looks around the diner.  It's in just as shape inside as it was out.  It may be open for business, there are no customers to be seen.  A single WAITRESS is  standing behind the barren counter. Alice walks across to the counter, and settles onto a sto The waitress steps over, and slides a tattered menu in fr of her.  Alice studies the woman for a moment.  Something about her is familiar.  It makes the girl uneasy. In her sixties, the waitress looks like she's worked ever day of her life.  Her hair is streaked with gray, and the are deep pockets under her eyes.  She seems to be the kin person whose life has passed her completely by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'll it be? Alice doesn't answer. WAITRESS (cont'd) (impatiently)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, honey.  I don't want to be here  forever. Alice notes the waitress' name badge: ALICE The waitress turns and heads down to the end of the count As the woman walks away, Alice swivels on her stool to wa her go. Alice is startled to discover that another PATRON is now  sitting next to her.  IT'S FREDDY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If the food don't kill ya, the service  will, hahaha! The waitress brings over a piping hot pizza.  She places in front of Freddy.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE PIZZA
dialogues.text: It has large pepperonis, only they're not pepperonis, the faces.  Screaming miniature faces.  The faces of Kristen, Sheila and Rick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhh!  The usual! Alice reacts in horror to the death-pizza.  The faces cry to her.  Their voices are high and squeaky, as you'd expe miniature voices to be.  The effect would be comical if i wasn't so torturous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Free us, Alice!  Free us!! Freddy tears the Rick face off the pizza and pops it in h mouth.  Alice gets up to run but Freddy grabs her by the  throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love SOUL FOOD!  Bring me more!! Alice tries not to, but a WHOOSH tells us that she's drag someone in.  Alice looks back towards the movie theater. It's gone.  What we see is Debbie's attic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debbie's attic.  Debbie is dozing on her weight bench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy CACKLES triumphantly.  He turns to Alice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your shift is over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sudden HONKING of a passing car HORN awakens Alice. sits for a moment in confusion before clearing her head. She rushes out, using the window as before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debbie opens her eyes.  She rubs them tiredly then looks  around and reaches for the bar bell.

dialogues.text: Dan's waiting with his truck on the corner.  Alice comes  running up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, we have to hurry.  I'm driving. She hops into the driver's seat and starts it up.  Dan ha time to object.  He hops in and they SCREECH off.

dialogues.text: Alice is driving like a demon.  Dan straps on the seatbel

dialogues.text: He's going after Debbie, I gotta stop  him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just feel sorry for me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cut that shit out.  Maybe before, but not  now. I want to help you. I'm on your  side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The truck barrels down the street, shaking with the speed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As long as your driving doesn't kill us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, we're just about there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Debbie extends the weights we can SEE FREDDY KRUEGER'S REFLECTION in the steel barbells.  Debbie brings the weig down and up again and Freddy is gone. Debbie slips the barbell into the resting place so she ca catch her breath.  She cracks her knuckles.  Suddenly, we one of Freddy's claws out the stereo box. Debbie reacts with puzzlement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: (straining)

dialogues.text: I believe in you... Straining hard to keep the weight from crushing her... Freddy laughs as he exerts more pressure and Debbie can o close her eyes and SCREAM in pain as her ELBOWS SNAP in t Cracked in half, bone tearing through the flesh and muscl FREDDY (cont'd) (laughing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice is driving like a lunatic.  All is as it was before

dialogues.text: Debbie forces herself to her feet, broken arms hanging li at her side. Insect like claws emerge out of the breaks in her arms. human flesh flops to the floor.  She ducks as Freddy heav the barbell into the mirrors in the attic. He starts advancing on her, claws CLICKING. Debbie looks up to Freddy with a pathetic

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice turns a corner, heading for a house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we are...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once again, as she's about to pull into Debbie's driveway suddenly SMASH CUT TO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, we have to hurry.  I'm driving. Dan hops in, as before.  They SCREECH OFF.

dialogues.text: Debbie, now even more insect-like, runs toward a small do at the other side of the attic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the door SEEMS TO GROW LARGER AND LARGER the closer  Debbie gets to it! As we see Debbie, she's tiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice drives like a lunatic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going after Debbie.  I gotta stop  him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I get the weirdest feeling  we've been through this before. Alice throws him a puzzled, confused look.  It may be daw on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The room is now a strange white space, flat and dull.  De tries to make her way across but her feet start sticking the gooey floor. Like the thickest glue. Debbie struggles to free herself, but as she pulls, she f over, her face sticking to the goo.  It RIPS her flesh to reveal an insect face.  A roach trapped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the third time, Alice is turning the corner headed  towards Debbie's driveway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's wrong here.  It feels like...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice is about to pull in, then BAM, SMASH CUT TO:

dialogues.text: You guessed it.  Dan waits as Alice comes running up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (simultaneously)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, we have to hurry.  I'm driving. Alice stares at Dan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh God, I'm still asleep.  He's got us  going in circles. They hop in and take off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debbie, now more roach than girl, sees another struggling roach in the corner.  Debbie painfully turns towards the  doorway and sees FREDDY'S HUGE EYE PEERING IN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice is suddenly hit with a violent shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (barely whisper)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Debbie.  She's gone.  I've...collected  her, like the others. A sudden, blinding brightness hits the truck. There are a pair of incredibly bright headlights coming  straight at them.  The lights grow brighter still until t are impossibly bright.  They burn off to reveal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy standing defiantly in the middle of the road, laug maniacally at Dan's on-coming truck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, asleep or awake, I'm gonna punch  his ticket in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the dream, the truck bears down on Freddy, smoke drift off the tires. We see Alice sneer as the truck passes right through Fred and SMASHES into a void, an invisible brick wall. The truck's front end gets totaled. Bits of metal and gla fly through the air as the truck crumples, as if it has h solid stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan's truck is wrapped around a large tree. Axles and gri work twisted out of place. A spurt of red smears the insi windshield. Alice manages to force open her door and just step out of truck...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Dan, I'm sorry.  GOD, I'M SORRY!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors swing open and two young PARAMEDICS lift Dan in on a stretcher.  His leg has been bandaged with gauze, bu it's bleeding badly.  His MOANING tells us he's conscious Alice climbs in and notices one of the paramedics filling hypo.  He checks it for air bubbles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that do? The paramedic turns toward Dan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relaxes your boyfriend. Alice jerks the paramedic's arm away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put the needle down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastic)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry doctor, rules is rules. Alice smacks the hypo out of the paramedic's hands.  It  SHATTERS against the wall of the ambulance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pure Dirty Harry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stays awake, those are my rules,  understand? The paramedic backs off a bit.  He looks at Alice with  suspicion.  Alice relents a bit. ALICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's allergic, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoulda said so in the first place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice leans in close to Dan, brushes his hair back with h fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let them put you to sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An intern and a nurse are trying to put Dan to sleep, but he's fighting them back. At least making it difficult. Alice stands by watching as THE DOCTOR, JOHNSON and DAN'S PARENTS run into the ER.  Alice charges the doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When do you operate? When does he hit  surgery?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the looks of him, probably 15  minutes. The doctor turns his attention to Dan, who's strapped to gurney.  They start to wheel him away. Alice checks her watch.  It's a quarter to 10.  She has 1 minutes before Dan is forced to sleep. Alice starts after Dan, but Johnson grabs her by the arms holds her back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let it be, Alice.  They'll help him. Johnson reaches in his pocket for his car keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gonna kill him. Alice snatches the keys from her father and runs for the  swinging EXIT doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice, dammit, get back here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice jumps in her father's car and cranks it over; burni rubber to back out of the parking lot. Alice drops the car in gear and takes off at top speed, b she SIDESWIPES ANOTHER CAR which is parked next to her.   Sparks, metal against metal. Alice BLASTS through the hospital lift-gate before SKIDDI into traffic and screaming away into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan is being wheeled on a gurney.  He's struggling to sta awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice barrels through a light and fishtails around a corn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice grips the wheel.  The speedometer is straining. She looks at the dashboard clock.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE CLOCK
dialogues.text: Eight minutes to 10.  She has eight minutes left to do  something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NURSE and an ORDERLY lift Dan onto the operating table. The room is being quickly prepped; checking instruments. Doctors scrubbing up. Activity all around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice SCREECHES to a halt in front of her house. She burs out of the car and runs into the house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the nurses lay out the instruments, Dan is still grogg The operating room clock tells us Alice has 5 minutes lef

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Alice runs through, she passes a gun rack mounted on t wall.  She doubles back to it.  She regards it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Couldn't hurt. She opens it and grabs a mean looking mother of a pump- shotgun and a box of shells.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the oxygen and anesthesia hoses put into place and gauges register pressure. The ANESTHESIOLOGIST preps the mask for Dan's face.  Dan  watches, protesting weakly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take the pain...no gas...no  gas...have to stay up. He fades out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice throws the gun and the shells on the bed.  She open bottle of sleeping pills and pops more than enough for a on Freddy express. She starts to load the gun, inserting each shell with vic precision.  She cocks it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This ends.  Now. She walks over to the mirror on the vanity table.  Her ey travel over the tokens she's collected form her friends. She starts to power up.  She takes Sheila's gadget, which she's improved, and hangs it around her neck.  She takes  Debbie's studded bracelet and SNAPS it around her wrist. Lastly, she takes Rick's oriental bandana and ties it lik Amazonian around her forearm.  She hoists the gun.  She l her reflection in the mirror.  Something's very different The pills are starting to take effect.  Alice grabs her  forehead. She looks back at the mirror.  She's strong, confidant, r to accept her destiny.  With forceful determination, she tears the rest of the  pictures off her mirror.  What she sees makes her GASP.

dialogues.speaker: ON THE REFLECTION
dialogues.text: It's Alice alright, but everything's turbo-charged.  She' leaner, meaner, her clothes are tighter, more battle-like Everything's accented.  The gadget around her neck is now super high-tech amulet.  The bracelet has spikes instead studs and seems to be made of shining titanium. This is no high school girl.  This is no dream warrior. is the dream master, ancient guardian of the gate of good dreams.  Alice speaks to her reflection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I lay me down to sleep. The reflection speaks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The master of dreams, my soul I'll keep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the reflection of my mind's eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evil sees itself and it shall DIE!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuckin' A. Alice looks at the shotgun, which remains the same in the reflection.  Next to her supernatural image, it doesn't s an impressive weapon. ALICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save it for Rambo. She tosses the gun aside and notices the clock on her van table.  It's 15 seconds to ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Dan starts to choke He opens his eyes and sees the doctor standing over him. It's FREDDY in surgical greens, razor-fingers at the read Dan pulls the mask from his face and cries out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Freddy!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ain't Dr. Seuss! Hahahaha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Alice!  Alice!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice HEARS Dan's distant cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice!!! The reflection of the Alice as the dream master has been  replaced by the image of the operating room.  Alice can s Freddy menacing Dan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away from him you SONOFABITCH!!! Alice goes diving headfirst into the mirror.  It sucks he in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice rolls onto the floor.  She now has the image of the DREAM MASTER from her mirror, complete with all the regal She's one pissed superhero. She looks around. Freddy's gone. Alice helps Dan off the table, since we're in the dream, injury is healed.  He gets an eyeful of Alice's spectacul new appearance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (astonished)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look great!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Save it for later.  Come on! Alice and Dan turn around and run for the doors.  Just as they get to them, Freddy throws them open from the other  side. On instinct, Dan leaps in front of Alice to confront Fred He grabs Dan's fist, holds his arms out and slashes Dan.  Once, twice, across the chest.  Blood spurts but it's onl superficial damage. Alice grabs the sharper of the the surgical instruments a turns on Freddy. ALICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll mail your guts back to hell!!! Alice starts to hurl the instruments at Freddy Kung Fu st with blurring speed and accuracy.  Rick would be proud. Alice nails Freddy once, a dozen times in the space of a seconds.  Freddy doubles over, sharp instruments sticking of every part of him.  Alice advances on him and delivers massive, sharp kick to Freddy's balls.  Freddy makes a SO that banshees would flee from. Alice grabs Dan and the two plunge through the doors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan and Alice run into the hallway.  But it's no hallway, it's a huge, rotating cylinder.  It looks like a hallway, it's spinning.  Dan and Alice immediately become dizzy. At the end of the hallway, there's a large, wall-to-wall  sheet of colorful lights.  It gives the impression that D and Alice are trapped within a huge kaleidoscope. They careen down the hallway and go crashing through the  colorful lights, which turn out to be stained glass. Dan and Alice CRASH through a stained glass window withou the gurney and land with such tremendous force that even  after hitting the floor they don't stop.  They skid along floor, out of control. Keeping Dan's hand in one hand, Alice reaches out and SLA her spiked bracelet into the floor.  The spikes dig in an serve as her break.  They SCREECH across the floor, smoke rises from the grooves they make.  Alice digs in deeper a they manage to come to a stop in a pile of broken stained glass. They stand up, just as Freddy appears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to wonderland, Alice!  Hahahaha! Dan leaps at Freddy.  Freddy slashes him across the chest superficially, but there's plenty of blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nooo!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doctors are working on Dan.  Suddenly, blood starts t spurt wildly from his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Christ, he's hemorrhaging badly!  Close  it off and bring him out of it!  Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the familiar VOICES of the Elm Street CHILDREN  begin to chant.  They're standing in the choir box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One two, Freddy's coming for you.  Three  four, better lock your door... Alice rushes to Dan's side. He starts to flicker, like a TV, then he starts to fade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Dammit, Alicceeeee..... She reaches for him, but he's gone, his echo remains for moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan's beginning to regain consciousness.  The doctor stan over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relax, son.  It was rough, but we pulled  you out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (urgent)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me back under.  Please!  Put me back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell??  Just a while ago you  were screaming not to be put under.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I changed my mind!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice crouches into a fighting position (a la Rick) as  Krueger advances, finger-blades flashing. Alice leaps and delivers a perfect kick to Freddy's face, knocking him back. Alice lands on her feet as Freddy lunges for her! Alice jumps over a church pew as Freddy slashes at the ai Alice whirls and kicks Freddy again and again and again. Just pounding him. But Freddy laughs at the blows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (contemptuous)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you got what it takes, I been  guarding my gate forever, hahaha! Freddy grabs Alice by the ankle and whirls her around lik rag doll and tosses her away. Alice is thrown the length of the church and CRASHES into confessional booth; splintered wood and cracking bones. Alice sinks heavy among the debris.  She doesn't move.   Freddy advances on her.  Going in for the kill.  Just whe he's close enough, Alice springs up.  She was playing pos She reaches out and PUNCHES a hole in the wall behind the debris of the confessional.  She pulls out several crackl electric cables.  She looks bizarre and powerful framed f moment in the blue light of the sparkling electricity. She rips off the gadget from around her neck and aims it Freddy.  Freddy LAUGHS at her and it. Alice shoves on of the electric cables into the center of gadget.  It HUMS and BUILDS and GLOWS until a LOUD,  incredibly powerful LASER BOLT shoots out of it and hits  Freddy square in the chest. A stunned Freddy looks at his mid-section.  Quite frankly it's missing.  There's only a gaping, smoking hole throug which Alice can see the rest of the church. Alice throws the smoking gadget and cable to the floor. has no time to savor her temporary victory however. Freddy's playing fill in the blanks with himself.  The  charred hole in his mid-section begins to fill in.  In a  matter of seconds, he's whole again. He laughs and starts to advance on Alice.  Frustrated, sh grabs a huge cross which she handles easily, then charges him. Freddy raises the cross.  On one pass, she tears open  Freddy's sweater, revealing the faces of the souls trappe within Freddy.  She gags at the sight. Freddy seizes the moment and grabs the cross.  He tosses away. Freddy SMACKS Alice across the face.  He grabs the back o her head and throws her over him, across the church and i the altar.  He advances on her. FREDDY (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am eternal... Alice is looking pretty bloody.  She tries to fend off Fr but he smashes her into the opposite wall.  She crumples pain beneath the broken stained glass window she came in  through. Freddy's coming for her.  His tongue wiggling like a deme Wile E. Coyote about to grab the Road Runner. The kids in the choirs SING OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For in the reflection of my mind's eye... The sun rises behind the window the children are standing front of.  The light hits the wall and works it's way to  Alice and the floor. Freddy steps into it as he advances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (remembering)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let evil see itself... Alice looks down and sees a large piece of stained glass. She sees her reflection in it, unbruised, pretty, the tru her.  She scoops it up and holds it in front of Freddy. The chorus of ghostly kids complete the rhyme with Alice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And it SHALL DIE! Freddy's about to slice into Alice, he raises his arm. Light hits Freddy off the glass, like a BLAST.  He looks Alice and sees himself, reflected in the glass.  He SCREA We PUSH IN on Freddy's SCREAMING reflection, right into h mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We ZOOM down into Freddy's innards which are made up of  struggling dead kids.  The souls, all trapped and hanging inside Freddy's body, start to break free as they SCREAM CRY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We travel through, then emerge out of FREDDY'S EYE.  We P BACK to reveal that Freddy's entire body is pulsing and  ripping from within.

dialogues.speaker: LET THEM OUT
dialogues.text: The trapped souls begin TEARING THROUGH FREDDY'S BODY; fl and blood erupting in all directions. Freddy's sweater stretches and rips apart.  Freddy double over as his HEAD BULGES.  All the tiny bodies inside him  surge upwards.  A tiny hand smashes through one eye. Finally, Freddy's head EXPLODES and the freed souls pour The force SHATTERS the glass in Alice's hands.  She  straightens up and watches as the souls swoop around her  before ZOOMING out the broken window. ALICE (cont'd)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're dead... All's quiet except for a steady wind that blows the shell Freddy Krueger and his hat down the church aisle. And out the door.  The double doors SLAM SHUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alice stands alone. She's no longer dressed like dream  master.  Having fulfilled her mission, she's now just nor Alice again, but retains the newfound beauty and confiden Alice stands frozen for a moment, then regards her quiet  surroundings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rest in hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dan and Alice are walking through the park, arms around e other.  From the look of their healing bruises, it's some weeks later...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
